participant_1.background:
I am slightly overweight because I spend too much time watching television and not enough time exercising.
My most valuable possession is my Tigers baseball jersey.
I am not vain, but I do take care of my appearance because I want to look my best when I travel with my twin sister.
I listen to music that helps me calm down and release my stress.
I take a deep breath and remind myself that I'm strong and capable.

participant_2.background:
I celebrate my birthday in a way that is not weather dependent.
I am single and enjoy my freedom to pursue my hobbies like fishing.
i love cheese cake.
I'm not a fan of Comic Con, but I do enjoy making organic cat food for my furry friend.
i love animals , especially dogs.

content.text: Hey! What's your favorite thing to do on a rainy day?
I love taking baths when it rains. Do you like watching TV?
I do, I love watching baseball and football. I'm a huge Tigers fan, and I have a Tigers baseball jersey that is my most prized possession.
That's cool. I love cheesecake, too. What are some of your favorite hobbies?
I love to travel with my twin sister. We're always looking for new places to explore. I also like to go fishing.
I'm single and love my freedom to pursue my hobbies. I enjoy making organic cat food for my furry friend.
That's awesome! I love animals, especially dogs.
I do, too. What do you do to relieve stress?
I listen to music that helps me calm down and release my stress. I also take a deep breath and remind myself that I'm strong and capable.
That's great! I'm glad you have healthy coping mechanisms.
Me too. I try to stay positive and focus on the things that I can control.
